sections.heading: TERMINATION OF PARENTAL AUTHORITYArt
sections.text: 235. Termination of parental authorityParental authority terminates upon the child's attaining the age of majority, upon the child's emancipation, or upon termination of the marriage of the parents of the child.Acts 2015, No. 260, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2016.
